full_summary:
Tender Notice – X-ray Fluorescence Spectrometer
==============================================

### Tender Details

* **Title (English)**: X-ray Fluorescence Spectrometer
* **Title (French)**: Spectromètre à fluorescence de rayon X
* **Reference Number**: cb-4768-72153944
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000067045
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-18

### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada is inviting current suppliers with a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies to submit a bid for the purchase of an X-ray fluorescence spectrometer.

* **UNSPSC Code**: *41115400 (Spectroscopic Equipment)
* **Estimated Quantity of Commodity**: 1 unit
* **Duration of Contract**: From the date of signature to March 31, 2024
* **Time Frame of Delivery**: From the date of signature to March 31, 2024

### Tendering Procedures

This is a competitive procurement process, with the best value evaluation strategy. Suppliers must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI to be eligible to bid. Only pre-qualified suppliers will be invited to bid.

The tender notice is published on Buy and Sell Canada for a period of 40 calendar days. Suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents for the closing date.

### Eligibility Requirements

To be eligible to bid, suppliers must have a current Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies. Suppliers who do not have a Supply Arrangement will not be eligible to bid.
